meanings.definition: A type of fish that is commonly found in coastal waters.
meanings.sent1: The surffish swam gracefully in the shallow waters near the beach.
meanings.sent2: I saw a surffish jumping out of the waves while I was surfing.
meanings.sent3: The surffish decided to throw a beach party for all its fish friends.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as elusive as a surffish in the vast ocean.
meanings.sent5: The surffish's scales shimmered like diamonds under the sunlight.

meanings.definition: To fish in the ocean from the shore.
meanings.sent1: We planned to surffish during our weekend getaway at the coast.
meanings.sent2: He loves to surffish early in the morning when the sea is calm.
meanings.sent3: Surffishing can be a relaxing way to spend time by the beach.
meanings.sent4: She hoped to surffish a big catch to impress her friends.
meanings.sent5: The old man taught his grandson how to surffish with patience and skill.
